#summary renderText(text)
#labels api,1.0

Category*:

[ControllerRequestFunctions Controller Request Functions]

*Description*:

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *text* || any || true || - || The text to be rendered ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset renderText("Done!")>
}}}
